title: The Workhorse Starting Pitcher Is Back
text:
The traditional starting pitcher, the backbone of baseball rosters for more than a century, seemed like a fading relic when the playoffs began. Starters accounted for just 58% of innings pitched across the majors this year, setting a record low for the fourth straight year. Recent postseasons only exacerbated the trend, with starters and relievers essentially splitting the outs last October.

But with the league championship series under way, something unexpected and strange has happened: The old workhorses are making a comeback,...
description: The traditional starting pitcher seemed like a fading relic when the playoffs began. But the old workhorses are making a comeback.
